ch.aplu.tcp

Interface TcpNodeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TcpNodeAdapter

    public interface TcpNodeListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Declarations of event notification methods of the TcpNode class. Keep in mind, that the order of the callback calls is not previsible.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageReceived(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String text)
      Fired when the node receives a message from another node (via the relay).
      void nodeStateChanged(TcpNodeState state)
      Fired when the connection state changes.
      void statusReceived(java.lang.String text)
      Fired when the relay sends status messages.

    • Method Detail

      • messageReceived

        void messageReceived(java.lang.String sender,
                   java.lang.String text)
        Fired when the node receives a message from another node (via the relay).
        Parameters:
        sender - the nickname of the sending node
        text - the transmitted data

      • statusReceived

        void statusReceived(java.lang.String text)
        Fired when the relay sends status messages.
        Parameters:
        text - the transmitted data

      • nodeStateChanged

        void nodeStateChanged(TcpNodeState state)
        Fired when the connection state changes.
        Parameters:
        state - one of the values defined in the TcpNodeState enumeration.
